overview: The main event from the Theater at Madison Square Garden in New York City, where they'll fight for Golovkin's WBA middleweight title.  Golovkin (27-0, 24 KO) weighed in at 159.6 pounds, with Stevens (25-3, 18 KO) coming in at 159.25 pounds, both just under the 160-pound limit.
title: Gennady Golovkin vs. Curtis Stevens
